sentences.sContent: No where in the article does it mention her financial status. So…what is it that leads everyone to assume she was indigent?
sentences.sContent_eng: No where in the article does it mention her financial status. So…what is it that leads everyone to assume she was indigent?
sentences.sCn: 在文章中哪也没提及她的财务状况。那么…究竟是什么导致每个人都认为她是贫困的？

sentences.sContent: They "either fail to pay anything or pay a greatly-reduced amount designed for indigent or low income patients lacking insurance, " according to DHS.
sentences.sContent_eng: They "either fail to pay anything or pay a greatly-reduced amount designed for indigent or low income patients lacking insurance, " according to DHS.
sentences.sCn: 他们“一分钱都不付或者只支付非常少的费用，原先为贫困或短缺保险的低收入病人设定的费用。”

remMethod.val: in(不) + dig(挖) + ent → 挖不出东西的 → 贫穷的
